thread.section_title: Hotel Lecourbe - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pretty hotel - great location
thread.title_full: Pretty hotel - great location - Review of Hotel Lecourbe, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mkulk
title: Pretty hotel - great location
text:
We stayed in a room with a view .... overlooking the street... a little small, but quiet, clean, and comfortable. We could see Montparnasse Tower in the distance ... looked lovely at night.
We enjoyed the breakfast - sumptuous - and lovely coffee. Good service too. The central courtyard is very pretty.
It is walking distance from the Metro, and to Eiffel Tower as well. In fact, we walked to most places.
Good eateries at walking distance- Lebanese, Chinese, and a lovely fruit stall as well.
Room Tip: Top floor overlooking the street is what we liked. See more room tips
